titleStmt.title: Virgil's Bucolicks Engished [sic]. VVhereunto is added the translation of the two first satyrs of Iuvenal. By Iohn Bidle
Bucolica. English
titleStmt.author: Virgil.
Biddle, John, 1615-1662.
Juvenal. Satura 1-2. English.

notesStmt.note: "A satyrical essay, or the tvvo first satyrs of Iuvenal Englished" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
